LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.awful_throner: I had to reign in an awful throneroom. It's like a deliberate insult from my inferiors.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.dull_thronero: I had to reign in a dull throneroom. It clearly diminished my stature.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.mediocre_thro: I had to reign in a mediocre throneroom. It didn't express my stature.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.very_impressi: I reigned in a very impressive throneroom. It expressed noticeable stature.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.extremely_imp: I reigned in an extremely impressive throneroom. It effectively demonstrated my stature.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.unbelievably_: I reigned in an unbelievably impressive throneroom. The commoners will be amazed at my highness.
LanguageData.ReignedInThroneroom.stages.wondrously_im: I reigned in a heavenly throneroom. It matched my grace and nobility.
